removed.subject: <% name %> Account deleted
removed.message:
Hello <% username %>,

your <% name %> account (<% email %>) has just been deleted.

Best regards,
The <% name %> Team.

passwordResetRequest.subject: <% name %> Password Reset
passwordResetRequest.message:
Hello <% username %>,

you are receiving this email because a password-reset request has been made for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:

<% link %>

If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

Best regards,
The <% name %> Team.

passwordReset.subject: Your <% name %> password has been changed
passwordReset.message:
Hello <% username %>,

the password-reset of your <% name %> account has been completed.

Best regards,
The <% name %> Team.

newMissions.subject: One of your targets just committed suicide
newMissions.message:
Hello <% username %>,

one of your targets in game '<% game %>' committed suicide.
Hence you've got assigned his target in the following ring(s):
<% listing %>

Visit <% link %> for your updated contracts.

Best regards,
The <% name %> Team.


-------------------------

Hallo <% username %>,

eines deiner Ziele im Spiel '<% game %>' hat das Zeitliche gesegnet.
Daher wurde dir sein Ziel in folgenden Ringen zugewiesen:
<% listing %>

Besuche <% link %> für aktualisierte Auftragsansicht.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Das <% name %> Team.

survived.subject: The last target within a ring just committed suicide
survived.message:
Hello <% username %>,

one of your targets in game '<% game %>' committed suicide.
Congratulations for being the last survivor in ring(s) <% listing %>!

Visit <% link %> for your remaining contracts.

Best regards,
The <% name %> Team.


-------------------------

Hallo <% username %>,

eines deiner Ziele im Spiel '<% game %>' hat das Zeitliche gesegnet.
Herzlichen Glückwunsch, du bist der letzte Überlebende in Ring(en) <% listing %>!

Besuche <% link %> für verbleibende Auftragsansicht.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Das <% name %> Team.
